name: PwmLight
description: A controller for 1 or more LEDs connected in parallel.

contents.name: brightness
contents.description:
Set the luminosity of the strip. The value is used to scale `start_intensity` in `steps` register.
At `0` the power to the strip is completely shut down.

contents.name: max_power
contents.description: Limit the power drawn by the light-strip (and controller).

contents.name: max_steps
contents.description: Maximum number of steps allowed in animation definition. This determines the size of the `steps` register.

contents.name: steps
contents.description:
The steps of current animation. Setting this also sets `current_iteration` to `0`.
Step with `duration == 0` is treated as an end marker.

contents.name: current_iteration
contents.description:
Currently excecuting iteration of animation. Can be set to `0` to restart current animation.
If `current_iteration > max_iterations`, then no animation is currently running.

contents.name: max_iterations
contents.description: The animation will be repeated `max_iterations + 1` times.
